ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Surnames
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can have the same last name as someone else. On my server, there are at least 25 toons with the last name of Lebowski, hehe. If for some reason the
ygData.messageBody:
--- "Steven R. Hulse" <steveh@...> wrote:
> Level 20. Just type in /surname <and the one you
> want> and if it's not taken
> you'll get it.

You can have the same last name as someone else. On my
server, there are at least 25 toons with the last name
of Lebowski, hehe. If for some reason the surname you
pick is rejected, you can petition to get it, unless
it is a phrase or some other violation of the naming
policy. I had to petition to get 2 of my characters
last names.

=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
